channel.title: notes on Ben Mezger
channel.description: Recent content in notes on Ben Mezger

item.title: Notes
item.description: ⚠️ Some notes I wrote and some of them are snippets I copied around the Internet. Unfortunately I don’t have the source for all of them, but I will try to keep this updated. Notes that tagged or start with TODO are notes that or I am still working on or that are simply incomplete 😔 I have discovered the reason for this code and it’s really quite necessary.
